statements: UPDATE fashion_designers SET designer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE designer_id = 1;
UPDATE fashion_designers SET resources_available = '{"sewing_machine": "Singer", "fabrics": ["cotton", "silk"]}' WHERE designer_name = 'Jane Smith';
UPDATE fashion_designers SET design_ideas = 'Sustainable fashion', resources_available = '{"sewing_machine": true, "fabric": true}' WHERE designer_id = 1
UPDATE fashion_designers SET designer_name = 'Alexander Wang', resources_available = '{"fabric": true, "threads": true}' WHERE designer_id = 2
UPDATE designer SET designer_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE designer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE design_resource SET resource_name = 'Sketches Collection', resource_description = 'Various sketches for inspiration' WHERE resource_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE designer SET location = 'New York' WHERE designer_id = '1234-5678'
UPDATE design_resource SET resource_description = 'This is a detailed description' WHERE resource_id = '9876-5432'
UPDATE designer SET location='New York' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE design_resources SET category='Tech' WHERE resource_name='Programming 101';
UPDATE designer SET location='New York', name='John Doe' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE design_resources SET category='Tech', url='https://example.com' WHERE resource_id=5;
UPDATE designer SET designer_location = 'New York' WHERE designer_id = 1;
UPDATE resources SET resource_type = 'Software' WHERE designer_id = 2;
UPDATE designer SET designer_name = 'New Designer Name', designer_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE designer_id = 1;
UPDATE design_ideas SET idea_description = 'Updated Idea Description', idea_image_url = 'newimageurl.jpg' WHERE idea_id = 5;
UPDATE designer SET location='New York' WHERE designer_id=1;
UPDATE resource SET designer_id=2, resource_type='Material' WHERE resource_id=5;
UPDATE designer SET location='New Location' WHERE designer_id=1;
UPDATE resource SET resource_type='Material' WHERE resource_id=2;
